title: How to Make a Chocolate Mousse Pie

steps.headline: Sprinkle gelatin over the top of the milk, and let stand for 1 minute.
Turn heat to low and stir until gelatin is dissolved.
Add chocolate pieces and keep stirring over low heat until the chips are melted.
Remove from heat and cool for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.
steps.description: When mixture mounds on your spoon, it's ready to add the Cool Whip.

steps.headline: Add the Cool Whip to the chocolate mixture and fold it in with a spoon until mixed.

text: Add milk to saucepan.  Sprinkle gelatin over the top of the milk, and let stand for 1 minute.  Turn heat to low and stir until gelatin is dissolved. This should take about 5 minutes. Add chocolate pieces and keep stirring over low heat until the chips are melted.  Stir in the vanilla.  Remove from heat and cool for 1 hour, stirring occasionally. When mixture mounds on your spoon, it's ready to add the Cool Whip. Add the Cool Whip to the chocolate mixture and fold it in with a spoon until mixed.  Pour mixture into pre-made crust.  Refrigerate overnight before serving.
